AboutScreen.name: Name

AddProfileByImportFromFileScreen.configExist: The Profile already exists, please do not add it repeatedly

AddProfileByLinkOrContentScreen.addFailedFormatException: The format is wrong, please correct it and add it again:

ChangeRegionScreen.title: Country Or Region
ChangeRegionScreen.Regions: Tip: Please set your current country or region correctly, otherwise it may cause network diversion problems

FileContentViewerScreen.title: File Content Viewer
FileContentViewerScreen.clearFileContent: Are you sure to clear the content of the file?
FileContentViewerScreen.clearFileContentTips: Are you sure to clear the content of the Profile file? Clearing the Profile file may cause data loss or abnormal application functions, please operate with caution

HomeScreen.noAvailableServer: No Servers Available, Please Add Profile
HomeScreen.invalidServer: The server is invalid, please choose again
HomeScreen.disabledServer: The server is disabled, please choose again
HomeScreen.expiredServer: No servers available, profiles may be expired
HomeScreen.proxyAllTips: When enabled, all traffic is forwarded through the proxy server
HomeScreen.myLinkEmpty: Please set up [Shortcut Link] before using it

LaunchFailedScreen.invalidProcess: The app failed to start [Invalid process name], please reinstall the app to a separate directory
LaunchFailedScreen.invalidProfile: The app failed to start [Failed to access the profile], please reinstall the app
LaunchFailedScreen.startFromUNC: The installation path is invalid, please reinstall it to a valid path

PerAppAndroidScreen.title: Per-App Proxy
PerAppAndroidScreen.whiteListModeTip: When enabled: only the apps that have been checked are proxies; when not enabled: only the apps that are not checked are proxies

AddProfileByScanQrcodeScanScreen.requestScreenAccess: Please go to System Settings - Privacy and Security - Screen Recording to add permissions for this application
AddProfileByScanQrcodeScanScreen.scanNoResult: Failed to parse the image, please make sure the screenshot is a valid QR code
AddProfileByScanQrcodeScanScreen.scanException: Failed to parse the image, please make sure the screenshot is a valid QR code:$p

QrcodeScreen.title: QR Code
QrcodeScreen.tooLong: The text is too long to display

DiversionRulesScreen.title: Diversion Rules
DiversionRulesScreen.finalSelectTips: If no rule is hit, this rule will be used; turning on [Proxy All] will cause this setting to become invalid

DiversionGroupCustomScreen.title: Custom Diversion Group
DiversionGroupCustomScreen.remarkExist: Remark already exists, please use another name

ServerSelectScreen.title: Select Server
ServerSelectScreen.autoSelectServer: Auto select the server with the lowest latency
ServerSelectScreen.selectLocal: The selected server is a local address and may not work properly:$p
ServerSelectScreen.error404: Latency detection encountered an error, please check if there is a configuration with the same content

MyProfilesScreen.title: Profiles
MyProfilesScreen.atLeastOneEnable: Cannot be disabled, please keep at least one profile enable
MyProfilesScreen.remarkExist: Remark already exists, please use another name
MyProfilesScreen.urlExist: URL already exists, please use another URL

SettingScreen.title: Settings
SettingScreen.downloadProfilePreferProxyTips: If currently connected, the profile will be downloaded through the connected proxy first
SettingScreen.enableIPv6Tips: Before enabling, please confirm that your network supports IPv6, otherwise some traffic cannot be accessed normally.
SettingScreen.dnsEnableRuleTips: After enabling, the domain name will select the corresponding DNS server for resolution according to the diversion rules
SettingScreen.dnsTypeOutboundTips: Domain name resolution for Proxy Server [https recommended]
SettingScreen.dnsTypeDirectTips: Domain name resolution for Direct Traffic
SettingScreen.dnsTypeProxyTips: Domain name resolution for Proxy Traffic
SettingScreen.dnsTypeResolverTips: Domain name resolution for Other DNS Server
SettingScreen.dnsTypeFinalTips: Domain name resolution for Other Traffic
SettingScreen.geoSiteAppleDirectOptimizationTips: When turned on, Apple GeoSite[apple,apple-ads,apple-dev,apple-pki,apple-update] will use the direct connection mode to obtain a better network experience
SettingScreen.autoSelectServerIntervalTips: The shorter the time interval, the more timely the server latency data updates, which will occupy more resources and consume more power
SettingScreen.autoSelectServerFavFirstTips: If the [My Favs] list is not empty, Then use the servers in [My Favs]
SettingScreen.autoSelectServerFilterTips: Server latency checks that fail will be filtered out
SettingScreen.autoSelectServerFilterNumTips: When the number of servers >= the threshold, [Filtering invalid servers] will be forcibly turned on
SettingScreen.autoSetSystemProxy: Auto Set System Proxy when Connected
SettingScreen.clusterAllowOtherHostsConnect: Allow Others to Connect to Cluster
SettingScreen.clusterConfirm: Please confirm that the servers latency have been checked, and proxy services will not be created if they are not checked or checked incorrectly
SettingScreen.tunModeTips: The TUN mode will take over all the traffic of the system [In this mode, you can leave the system proxy unenabled]
SettingScreen.tunModeRunAsAdmin: The TUN mode requires system administrator permissions, please restart the app as an administrator
SettingScreen.quitWhenSwitchSystemUser: Exit App when Switch System Users
SettingScreen.removeSystemVPNConfigConfirm: Confirm To Delete system VPN configuration?
SettingScreen.sleepWithSystemTips: After the system goes to sleep, the VPN suspends service; after the system resumes, the VPN automatically resumes service.

FeedbackScreen.title: Feedback
FeedbackScreen.contentCannotEmpty: Feedback content can not be empty
